ing.item: To 6 Perdue Individually Frozen boneless, skinless chicken breasts
To 2 tsp. Cajun or Creole seasoning

directions.step: Preheat oven to 350Ã¸F. Lightly grease 13x9 inch baking dish. Sprinkle chicken with Cajun seasoning; place in baking dish. In large bowl, combine onion, rice, black-eyed peas and tomatoes. Pour over chicken. Cover and bake 45 minutes. Uncover and bake 15 minutes longer, or until chicken is cooked through. Sprinkle with parsley before serving. Makes 4 to 6 servings. Typed in MMFormat by cjhartlin@msn.com Source: Best Recipes 101 Casseroles. Posted to brand-name-recipes by "Cindy Hartlin" <cjhartlin@email.msn.com> on Feb 20, 1998
